feed.title: Maximvdw's Publications
feed.subtitle: Publications of Maxim Van de Wynckel

entry.title: Interoperable and Discoverable Indoor Positioning Systems
entry.content: Van de Wynckel, M. (2025). Interoperable and Discoverable Indoor Positioning Systems [PhD thesis]. Vrije Universiteit Brussel – WISE lab.

entry.title: OpenHPS: A Modular Framework to Facilitate the Development of FAIR Positioning Systems

entry.title: Jong Talent: Maxim Van de Wynckel (30) zoekt oplossingen om gebruikers meer controle te geven over hun locatiegegevens

entry.title: Master thesis: Indoor Navigation by Centralized Tracking
entry.content: Van de Wynckel, M. (2019). Indoor Navigation by Centralized Tracking [Master’s thesis, Vrije Universiteit Brussel]. https://researchportal.vub.be/en/studentTheses/indoor-navigation-by-centralized-tracking

entry.title: Bachelor thesis: eID IO - Applicatie besturing
entry.content: My bachelor thesis was to provide remote actions for eID authentication. It was awarded the best thesis of the class of 2016.

entry.title: Final work: WisaReg
entry.content: WisaReg is an application that provides newly registered students from the Wisa database with accounts for various services. It was awarded the best final work of 2013.
